headings.usage: All section titles, hero headlines, property names. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.

body.usage: Listing details, descriptions, UI elements. High legibility.

accent.usage: Price tags, technical specs (sqm), meta-data. Small sizes only.

secondary.name: Sunset Terracotta
secondary.usage: Call to Actions (CTAs), Price highlights, 'New' badges

navigation.behavior: Sticky, transitions from transparent to white on scroll
navigation.elements: Logo left, Links center (clean sans), CTA right (Pill shape)

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-4 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50

property_card.style: Minimalist, no visible border, heavy shadow on hover only
property_card.content: Clean typography, price prominent in Serif, icons for beds/baths in muted gray

hero_section.layout: Full screen background image with central search box floating

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Extend theme with 'font-serif': ['Playfair Display'] and 'font-sans': ['DM Sans']. Add colors 'adriatic' (#0F172A) and 'terracotta' (#EA580C).
3. NAVIGATION: Build a responsive Navbar that is NOT 'fat'. Use h-16 or h-20 max. Use a transparent background that becomes white/blur on scroll.
4. HERO: Create a 'HeroSearch' component. Use one of the 'hero_images' as background. Center the search bar. Make it look like Airbnb/ImmoScout but cleaner.
5. LISTINGS: Create a 'PropertyCard' component. Use the 'property_images'. Ensure the price is bold and serif. Add hover effects (lift up).
6. FOOTER: Create a clean, multi-column footer with 'Adriatic Deep' background and white text.
7. USE SHADCN: Use 'Select' for filters, 'Carousel' for hero gallery, 'Card' for properties, 'Sonner' for toasts.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'search-button', 'filter-dropdown', 'property-card-1').
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'Bootstrap' look. Use custom padding and shadows.
Do not use gradients for text unless specified.
Keep the design 'Airy' - lots of whitespace.
